mainText:
Thank you for your simplicity

Thank you for your creativity

Thank you for your ideas

Thank you for your passion

Thank you for wanting better.  I did not know you but everyday I live my life better because of you.  How could one person impact so many people he does not know?

Only a person with a love for every beautiful detail of life could do 
that.  Only a person who understands the best parts of humanity could help so 
many to enjoy life

And change the world so completely through his vision

Thank you Steve Jobs
author: Donna
